# FeatureStore { #pytimetk.FeatureStore }

```python
FeatureStore(
    root_path=None,
    catalog_filename='catalog.json',
    default_storage_format='parquet',
    artifact_uri=None,
    artifact_backend=None,
    enable_locking=True,
    lock_timeout=30.0,
    lock_poll_interval=0.2,
)
```

Lightweight on-disk feature store with metadata cataloguing.
